events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the device has several scratches and does not work properly.
The issue has been classified as Product Defect due to the reported scratches and malfunction.
A support agent specialized in product defects has been assigned to your case for assistance.
Hello, this is Alex from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your device. I am here to help.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and describe the problems you are experiencing in more detail?
I have attached pictures showing the scratches on the screen and the device won't turn on despite charging it fully.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer to send a replacement unit immediately or process a return for a full refund. Which option would you prefer?
I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and help.
We've arranged shipment of a replacement device today and you should receive a tracking number shortly. The defective unit return label will be included.
Just following up to ensure your replacement device arrived in good condition and is functioning properly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since you have confirmed the replacement works well and no further issues were reported, we will now close this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
